item.description:
Meet at Haines Park in Barrington for a 20-25 mile ride.  I am planning on riding about 13+ mph.

DO NOT go to the boat launch parking lot!  From the East: take 195 to exit 4.  Stay to the right towards Riverside.  Follow Veterans Memorial Parkway to rte 103 south.  Follow rte 103 south about 6 miles and look for the signs to Haines Park.  Continue straight to the parking lot. 

From the WEST:  Take exit 6 off 195 west.  At the bottom of the exit ramp, turn left onto South Broadway.  Continue straight on South Boadway for about 3 miles where it merges with rte 103.   Follow rte 103 south about 6 miles and look for the signs to Haines Park. Continue straight to the parking lot. 

My cell is 401-369-5615
item.name: Biking on The East Bay Bike Path
